sense.gloss: favour, favor, patronage, favouritism, favoritism, partiality
liking something, being partial to something, -phile
bixi, dragon with the shell of a turtle (Chinese mythology)
to favor, to favour, to show favor to, to show favour to, to be partial to, to be a regular customer of
seeing things in a favourable light (favorable)
sympathy for a tragic hero, rooting for the underdog
each person supporting (patronizing) his (her) own favorite

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はいつも↑女↑↓おんな↓の↑子↑↓こ↓を↑贔屓↑↓ひいき↓する。
sdata.e: He is always partial to the company of girls.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑先生↑↓せんせい↓のご↑贔屓↑↓ひいき↓だ。
